lines.text:
[in response to the newspaper saying that the carrot crop freeze is making rabbits flee in droves]
In droves? But I don't have a drove.
[after pouring water into Ralph and Ed's car, Bugs opens it to see them swimming]

[gleefully]
Hey Mama! Look at the funny fish!
[Scene on board a Chattonooga Choo-Choo boxcar]
Hey, Ralph. You want to know something? I'm hungry.
You're hungry? Why, I'm so hungry my stomach thinks my throat's scut. If I don't get something to eat soon, I'll go nuts!
